item.description:
The group’s performance will include their string of hits, mostly from the 1970s: "Could it Be I’m Falling in Love," "It’s a Shame," "I’ll Be Around," "Working My Way Back to You," "I’m Coming Home," "Love Don’t Love Nobody," "Games People Play" and "Rubberband Man."
I personally Love ther music :-) Be there or be square :-)
item.why: Third part in Hamdens concert serious non other then the "Spinners" performing live on the green"Can you believe it and the concert is "Free" bring a bottle of your favorite wine and a snack to share and its time to groove on down the road :-)

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "The Spinners in Concert" WOW this will be fantastic
